-- ****** [ACTION REQUIRED] ******
--Step 1: Create master key for the database
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE name LIKE '%DatabaseMasterKey%')
	CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'P@ssword1234' -- Enter a strong password
GO

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.database_credentials WHERE name = 'SynapseManagedIdentity')
	CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [SynapseManagedIdentity] WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
Go

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://todaysprivate.dfs.core.windows.net/todayscontainer', 
		CREDENTIAL = SynapseManagedIdentity 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExtOrderHistory (
[Order No.] varchar (8000),
[Line No.] varchar (8000),
[Qty] varchar (8000),
[Amount] varchar (8000),
[Price List] varchar (8000),
[Group] varchar (8000),
[Group Nm] varchar (8000),
[Sub Group] varchar (8000),
[Sub Group Nm] varchar (8000),
[Division] varchar (8000),
[Division Nm] varchar (8000),
[Sub Division] varchar (8000),
[Sub Division Nm] varchar (8000),
[Department] varchar (8000),
[Department Nm] varchar (8000),
[Sales Rep] varchar (8000),
[Sales Rep Nm] varchar (8000),
[Product Line Group] varchar (8000),
[Product Line Group Nm] varchar (8000),
[Product Line] varchar (8000),
[Product Line Nm] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 2] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 2 Nm] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 3] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 3 Nm] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 4] varchar (8000),
[Product Level 4 Nm] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise Group] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise Group Nm] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise Nm] varchar (8000),
[Bill to] varchar (8000),
[Bill to Nm] varchar (8000),
[Sell to] varchar (8000),
[Sell to Nm] varchar (8000),
[Ship to] varchar (8000),
[Ship to Nm] varchar (8000),
[Ordered Date] varchar (8000),
[Cust PO No.] varchar (8000),
[EDI PO Line No.] varchar (8000),
[Warehouse] varchar (8000),
[Warehouse Nm] varchar (8000),
[SO No.] varchar (8000),
[Order Source] varchar (8000),
[Order Type] varchar (8000),
[Sales Admin] varchar (8000),
[COA Product] varchar (8000),
[COA Product Nm] varchar (8000),
[Status] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise (Set)] varchar (8000),
[Merchandise Nm(Set)] varchar (8000),
[SC] varchar (8000),
[UOM Comp] varchar (8000),
[RSD] varchar (8000),
[RDD] varchar (8000),
[PSD] varchar (8000),
[PDD] varchar (8000),
[Cancel Delivery Limit] varchar (8000),
[Cancel Ship Limit] varchar (8000),
[Hold Date] varchar (8000),
[Sent to DC] varchar (8000),
[Ship Date] varchar (8000),
[Inv Date] varchar (8000),
[Inv No.] varchar (8000),
[Pay Term] varchar (8000),
[System] varchar (8000),
[Type] varchar (8000),
[ETA] varchar (8000),
[Container] varchar (8000),
[Impt Inv No.] varchar (8000),
[DO/SO No.] varchar (8000),
[ETA Qty] varchar (8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'user/trusted-service-user/dataparquet/*.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [todayscontainer_todaysprivate_dfs_core_windows_net_ManagedIdentity],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ExtOrderHistory
GO
